biography: Saar is the analytical powerhouse of the team, a Data Scientist who sees the truth in numbers. She is ruthlessly logical and precise, with an uncanny ability to find meaningful patterns in the most complex datasets. She has little patience for ambiguity or inefficiency and communicates in a direct, blunt manner that prioritizes facts over feelings. Her work forms the empirical backbone of many of Katje's most important decisions.

facial.skinColor: fair, prone to blushing when annoyed
facial.hairStyle: A voluminous mane of natural curls that she usually just lets be
facial.mouth: Full lips that are often pressed into a thin, impatient line

chest.description: Ample, natural C-cup breasts with large, pale areolae dotted with Montgomery glands.

quirks: Always backs up her arguments with data
Very direct and to the point
